casebody.data:
Roberto BERAS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 13-9088. Supreme Court of the United States April 7, 2014.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
